评论详情: This top is amazing quality with soft, thick, spandex-like material. I’m wearing nip covers but it’s not see through at all without them. First photo is the full length and second photo is how it sits after moving around a bit. I’m 5’0, 108lbs and the xs fits great just slightly tight around the arms. I also got this in brown both colors are pretty and vibrant.
Nice heavy duty material comfortable and fits in all the right places. I feel like it is very flattering as well.

评论概述: Definitely more cropped than I thought
评论详情: I like the material and thickness, but the shirt is definitely cropped. I'm 5'3" and 145 lbs and it's just slightly at the end of my belly button.

When I opened this I was like omg it’s tiny! I was debated between a small and a medium, I’m usually a small but the spandex material made we question it. - I still got a small. Anyways, I have larger boobs and this shirt held them up so good - NO BRA. So soft, thick material. I’m actually in love with it. It fits perfect!
I love it so much! I highly recommend it. The medium size is pretty small, just keep that in mind.
Neckline looks nice in the display photo but in reality the cut is super awkward. The material is nice and thick, but the cut just ruins this for me unfortunately.

I love this top! The green is a perfect color and its so flattering on my body. It is a super soft and thick material. Dont usually wear a bra with it and I feel like its not noticeable. Its the perfect length and true to size.

Big boob friendly. Thick with enough stretch to contour you. The neckline is super flattering and hits at just the right spot. No bra necessary. Great quality material, holds you in and true to the size chart. Bought two more later on so i could have new colors. Good value.
Product arrived with makeup stains and dirty
I bought so many of these in various styles/colors!

What a great tank. Much better quality than I was expecting for the price. I love this blue color too. I will definitely get more colors. You do need a good brat of pair with it because of how low-cut it is and how wide the straps are. It's definitely a casual top. Wouldn't use it for working out or anything. It's really comfortable and you don't feel exposed or anything. Just beware it is a true crop tank so your tummy will be exposed if you don't have a super high-waisted bottom.
Absolutely love this tank top. I’ve ordered it in multiple colors. It’s tight fitting and pushes the girls up just right super supportive.
Flattering fit overall and super comfortable! I love the material, I was able to wear a sticky bra underneath and the material was thick enough that it didn’t show the outline of my sticky bra.
I bought this for my daughter. She loves it, it’s very soft and fits well. The color was true to the picture.

I have to wear this now that it's winter with a blouse over, but it's sure up lifting and sexy. No need for a bra, ladies, and that's a plus. I'm a 40 DD. Tummy needs to be in shape a bit to wear alone.

This was definitely more of a midi crop. I did not want my tank top to be that short. It wasn't too flattering the neckline kind of pulled with the Arm strap. It was good quality but I had to return it because it was just not meant for me.

They are amazing thick quality, I bought them in 4 colors !! But the white was a little see thru so had to return that one:(  No need to wear a bra with these, very supportive!  I'm in love with these shirts!!! I'm a 34DD athletic build and bought all smalls.  They all fit perfect:)

评论概述: Great for the ladies with big chests!
评论详情: I am a young woman with a massive chest. It is near impossible to find tops that are skimpy/revealing that I can wear on a night out. Most tops don't have support and I have to wear a bra, and if you're anything around my size, pretty much the only option we have is thick strap granny looking bras. It ruins the overall aesthetic of any outfit. Being able to rock this shirt without a bra is such a WIN, but I love that it has a high back because then I can still wear a bra if I really think I need it. The fabric is super thick and stretchy and has such a good hold to it. It makes the shape of my chest look great, can't recommend enough.
Super stretchy and comfortable
My favorite top

评论概述: One of the best tops on Amazon

Square neck but covered in the back. White was NOT see through!!!

One of my favorite going out tops. It's pretty thick, so it snatches everything in as long as you size down. It's not the right shape to hide armpit fat, at least on me, but that's not really a concern for me. It's lasted several months and several washes with no pilling or snags.
This too is cute and sucks you in all the right places.
I wear this all the time- I am obsessed and ordered in multiple colors.
Fit perfectly!

it fits me perfectly and i am able to wear it with or without a bra

评论概述: Runs very large, I would size down.
评论详情: I have a shorter torso with a larger bust (38 ddd). I usually wear a large in tops, especially crop and form fitting shirts but the large was extremely large and the straps wouldn’t stay up. I ordered this last minute for an event to make up for another large fitting shirt I purchased on here and unfortunately neither worked and I had to wear an old reliable. I would size down with this piece, especially if you have a short torso. On a positive note, the fabric was nice, thick, smooth, high quality, even in white and not see through at all.
The square neckline gives it a trendy and sophisticated look, perfect for a night out. The cropped length pairs perfectly with high-waisted jeans or a skirt, making it super versatile. 10/10!
My girl wears a Medium and this medium was too tight for her so runs a little small. We reordered the large.

Absolutely love this top. I’ve seen many types like it online on social media, but have never found any in my size, so I was ecstatic that this brand popped up on my search results and I saw they had this in an XXL. Super comfortable material and you can dress it up or down. I don’t need to wear a bra and it holds my chest area great (42DDD). I also am in love with the back. It’s hard to find tops that don’t reveal your back (which I’m insecure about because of my bacne) but this is perfect! I definitely plan on buying this in more colors.

I am about to buy this shirt in every other color!!!
Very cute top! The size medium fits me well.
